page.title: 14POLLUTION CONCERNS
page.content: There is clearly a need to for all forms of pollution to be adequatly controlled,to avoid damage to water supplies,local ecological envirment,recreation and holidaymaking.In this area streams are small and sewerage cannot be adequatly diluted.With sustained local pressure the Regional Water Authority were persuaded to appoint this area with a substantial new sewerage system,which has cost several million pounds,and collects the waste from this and several other local villages and is eventually deposited into the River near Whitingham,near Norwich.
